name: TOBY KNAPP-STATIC WARFARE cd
description:
Guitarist Toby Knapp is back with an onslaught of haunting, dark, virtuostic instrumental tracks on his new release STATIC WARFARE.

9 tracks were created  from this former guitarist of the legendary classic metal band Onward...and are now ready to be unleashed on the public. 

A must for heavy metal and guitar fanatics.

AND AS A CHRISTMAS BONUS YOU WILL GET A FREE DOWNLOAD CARD OF TOBY'S LIMITED RELEASE ARCHIVES OF MAGICK..VOLUME TWO!

name: CHRIS BICKLEY-TAPESTRY OF SOULS CD.
description:
From the first song -Racecar Guy to the last Old No.9, Chris and the guest vocalists on this CD give it their all. There are guest appearances by such notable vocalists as Mike Vescera (Yngwie Malmsteen, Loudness), Kelly Keeling (John Norum, Trans Siberian Orchestra, Michael Schenker Group), Chandler Mogel, (Outloud, Talon) and Jimmy Kunes (Savoy Brown, Cactus). There is truly not one of these eleven tracks that doesn’t absolutely rock!

The band also includes members from Obsession, House Of Lords, Johnny Winter, Trouble Tribe and many more. Chris himself has played with Ron Keel, Joe Stump, Thunderhead, SNL singer Christine Ohlman, and Terri Lane. 

Produced by Vic Steffens and Chris Bickley . Mastered by 10 time Emmy award winner and two time Grammy award nominee, Jim Chapdelaine.


" Plenty of energy, solid musicianship by all those involved and music that doesn’t drive the listener away with too much syrup or reckless aggression make this an outstanding debut release by Chris Bickely. He is the master of his domain and crafts enjoyable songs that instrumental fans as well as those who like their music with vocals surely will enjoy."
--John Kindred ( Hard Rock Haven) 

"In Chris Bickley you have a guitar player who THE total package, not just incredible chops, but great feel and phrasing. Plus hes an amazing songwriter, who has created some great melodic rock songs with some talented musicians... This CD is a must have for fans of melodic rock! "
--Michael Mcdowell (Shredguy records)

"Chris Bickley’s debut solo album really sounds amazingly good on all areas, this guys has it all without a doubt"
--Stefan (Metal to Infinity)

name: MICHAEL ABDOW-LIFE SYMBOLIC CD
description:
Follow up to Michael Abdow's top selling debut Native Alien. Mr Abdow returns with a progressive display of guitar heroics. 10 tracks...keyboard wizard Jimmy Pitts guests on one track.
Life Symbolic will surely be one of the top guitar releases for 2013!

name: AJI BROKENBONES SAVE OUR CULTURE OF SUNDANESE CD
description:
BRAND NEW RELEASE from the INDONESIAN PHENOM AJI BROKENBONES SAMIAJI.

WORLD MUSIC SHRED GUITAR!

7 TRACKS....AND ONE VIDEO TRACK.

NEO-CLASSICAL SHRED MIXED WITH SUNDANESE ETHNIC MUSIC.

AJI IS ENDORSED BY RICK HANES GUITARS AND IS ONE OF THE MOST CELEBRATED GUITAR PLAYERS IN SOUTHEAST ASIA.

BUY HIS DEBUT CD TODAY!

name: TOM KOPYTO-RESURRECTION CD/NEW RELEASE
description:
“RESURRECTION”: Tom’s debut CD for Shredguy Records. 8 tracks of virtuoso instrumental guitar with special guests Mark Zonder (Fates Warning), Jason Bittner (Shadows Fall, Marty Friedman), and Matt Garstka (Animals as Leaders) on drums, bassist Andy DeLuca (Symphony X, Michael Angelo Batio, James LaBrie’s Mullmuzzer), and guitarists Mike Abdow (Last Chance to Reason, Solo Artist) and Oli Herbert (All That Remains). The record was mixed and mastered by Keith Merrow at Merrowsoud Studios.

Releases FEBRUARY 5TH 2013
